title: "5 Ways ChatGPT Fell Short In Helping Me Create A Netflix Rival"
excerpt: "StreamSphere would need capital to grow. ChatGPT listed potential types of investors, such as venture capital and private equity firms, angel investors, strategic investors and crowdfunding platforms. This laundry list of investors left the founder with a list of to-dos much like the ones for building the management team."
